text: The Rothschild Lamp is a 16th-century bronze oil lamp. Made by Italian gold and metal-smith Andrea Riccio, the lamp was a longtime possession of the Rothschild family. The lamp was acquired by the Metropolitan Museum of Art in 2009, and remains in the museum's collection. == References == Category:Individual lamps Category:Metalwork of the Metropolitan Museum of Art
title: Rothschild Lamp
